title: Smart Data Models - PssIEEE2B
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type PSS2B power system stabilizer model. This stabilizer model is designed to represent a variety of dual-input stabilizers, which normally use combinations of power and speed or frequency to derive the stabilizing signal.  Reference: IEEE 2B 421.5-2005 Section 8.2.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PssIEEE2B

inputSignal1Type.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Type of input signal #1.  Typical Value = rotorSpeed. Default: None

inputSignal2Type.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Type of input signal #2.  Typical Value = generatorElectricalPower. Default: None

ks1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer gain (Ks1).  Typical Value = 12. Default: 0.0

ks2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain on signal #2 (Ks2).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

ks3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain on signal #2 input before ramp-tracking filter (Ks3).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

m.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Denominator order of ramp tracking filter (M).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

n.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Order of ramp tracking filter (N).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0.12. Default: 0

t10.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T10).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t11.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T11).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T3).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

t6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant on signal #1 (T6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant on signal #2 (T7).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

t8.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead of ramp tracking filter (T8).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

t9.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lag of ramp tracking filter (T9).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

tw1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. First washout on signal #1 (Tw1).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

tw2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Second washout on signal #1 (Tw2).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

tw3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. First washout on signal #2 (Tw3).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

tw4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Second washout on signal #2 (Tw4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

vsi1max.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Input signal #1 max limit (Vsi1max).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

vsi1min.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Input signal #1 min limit (Vsi1min).  Typical Value = -2. Default: 0.0

vsi2max.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Input signal #2 max limit (Vsi2max).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

vsi2min.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Input signal #2 min limit (Vsi2min).  Typical Value = -2. Default: 0.0

vstmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer output max limit (Vstmax).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

vstmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer output min limit (Vstmin).  Typical Value = -0.1. Default: 0.0
